snippet: The suspects in the killings of three photojournalists and a publicist were picked up on drug and weapons charges, and confessed to the murders.
abstract: Critics express doubts over announcement by local authorities in Veracruz, Mexico, that members of a drug gang who were detained spontaneously confessed to the high-profile murders of three photojournalists; contend that the state officials, in their haste to solve the crimes, are resorting to questionable confessions and unreliable identifications.
lead_paragraph: The suspects in the killings of three photojournalists and a publicist were picked up on drug and weapons charges, and confessed to the murders.

headline.seo: Skepticism Greets Arrests in Murders of Mexican Journalists
headline.main: Murder Arrests in Mexico Met With Skepticism
headline.print_headline: Murder Arrests In Mexico Met With Skepticism
